Package ca.phon.app.session.editor

Interface EditorDataModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultEditorDataModel
public interface EditorDataModel
Data model for the session editor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getNextRecordIndex​(int idx)
    Return the index of the next record from the given index.
    int getPrevRecordIndex​(int idx)
    Return the index of the previous record from the given index.
    Record getRecord​(int idx)
    Get record at given index.
    int getRecordCount()
    Get the number of records.
    RecordFilter getRecordFilter()
    Record filter associated with the model
    Session getSession()
    Get the session (if any) associated with the editor.
    Transcriber getTranscriber()
    If the session is in 'blind' mode then this method will return the transcriber that is currently making edits.
    void setRecordFilter​(RecordFilter filter)
    Set the record filter associated with the model.
    void setTranscriber​(Transcriber transcriber)
    Set the blind mode transcriber

  • Method Details

    • getSession

      Session getSession()
      Get the session (if any) associated with the editor.
      Returns:
      session

    • getRecordCount

      int getRecordCount()
      Get the number of records.
      Returns:
      number of records

    • getRecord

      Record getRecord​(int idx)
      Get record at given index.
      Parameters:
      idx -
      Returns:
      record

    • getNextRecordIndex

      int getNextRecordIndex​(int idx)
      Return the index of the next record from the given index. This method uses the record filter if present to determine what the 'next' record would be in a list.
      Parameters:
      idx -
      Returns:
      the index of the next record or < 0 if at the end of the list or idx is out of bounds

    • getPrevRecordIndex

      int getPrevRecordIndex​(int idx)
      Return the index of the previous record from the given index. This method uses the record filter if present to determine what the 'next' record would be in a list.
      Parameters:
      idx -
      Returns:
      the index of the next record or < 0 if at the beginning of the list or idx is out of bounds

    • getRecordFilter

      RecordFilter getRecordFilter()
      Record filter associated with the model
      Returns:
      the record filter, may be null

    • setRecordFilter

      void setRecordFilter​(RecordFilter filter)
      Set the record filter associated with the model. This may change the record count in the session. Use null to turn off filtering.
      Parameters:
      filter -

    • getTranscriber

      Transcriber getTranscriber()
      If the session is in 'blind' mode then this method will return the transcriber that is currently making edits.
      Returns:
      transcriber or null if not in blind mode

    • setTranscriber

      void setTranscriber​(Transcriber transcriber)
      Set the blind mode transcriber
      Parameters:
      transcriber -
